verbose_text: We confirmed that HAP1 cells were sensitive to erastin2, a potent system x c - inhibitor and ferroptosis inducing agent, and that erastin2 induced cell death was inhibited by co-treatment with the lipophilic radical trapping antioxidant ferrostatin-1 or the iron chelator deferoxamine (DFO), but not the pan-caspase inhibitor Q-VD-OPh (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
